item.title: Should strawberry move over just yet? Pineberry flavored alcoholic drinks in the works
item.description:
Should strawberry move over just yet? Pineberry flavored alcoholic drinks in the works

R&D company Comax Flavors has developed a pineberry flavor for alcoholic beverages that it hopes will become a mainstream flavor choice for consumers. The pineberry, also referred to as hula berry, looks like a smaller inverted strawberry with a white exterior speckled with red seeds and has a pineapple-like flavor.

item.title: News | Refresco Gerber
item.description:
News | Refresco Gerber

Refresco Gerber is the leading European bottler of soft drinks and fruit juices for retailers and branded customers with production in the Benelux, Finland, France, Germany, Iberia, Italy, Poland and the UK.
